affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.
notes:
The two buffs can be removed separately by purge.
The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.
attrib:
DURATION: 3/4/5/6
MOVE SPEED DRAIN: 32%/32%/32%/32%
ATTACK SPEED DRAIN: 64/64/64/64
cmb:
100
16/14/12/10
lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
name: visage_grave_chill

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Visage damages the targeted unit based on the number of soul charges.  Visage gains a soul charge when damage taken by all heroes around him reaches the damage threshold.
notes:
Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2 and less than 3000 that is dealt by a player or Roshan. Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.
Soul Assumption cannot be disjointed.
attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 20
SOUL DAMAGE: 65
DAMAGE THRESHOLD: 110
MAX SOULS: 3/4/5/6
SOUL DURATION: 6
ASSUMPTION RADIUS: 1375
cmb:
170/160/150/140
4
lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
name: visage_soul_assumption

desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from physical and magical attacks.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
notes: Each time Visage receives damage greater than 2 that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.
attrib:
ARMOR PER LAYER: 1/2/4/5
RESIST PER LAYER: 3%/6%/12%/16%
MAX LAYERS: 4
LAYER RECOVERY TIME: 4
lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
name: visage_gravekeepers_cloak

desc:
Conjures up two blind Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time. Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing. While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health and damage. Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.
Each Familiar starts with 7 damage charges. Familiars are Spell Immune.
attrib:
FAMILIAR ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 3
FAMILIAR ARMOR: 0/1/2
FAMILIAR SPEED: 380/390/400
FAMILIAR MAX DAMAGE: 56/98/154
cmb:
150/150/150
180/160/140
lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
name: visage_summon_familiars
